flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Its hard scalesnprovide strongnprotection. Itfuses its heftynbulk to executenpowerful moves.
Its hard scalesnprovide strongnprotection. Itfuses its heftynbulk to executenpowerful moves.
Tough scales covernthe sturdy bodynof this POKéMON.fIt appears thatnthe scales grownin cycles.
Its body is cover­ned with needle-nlike scales. Itfnever shows signsnof shrinking fromnany attack.
It uses its scaly,nrugged body tonseal the entrancefof its nest andnprotect its youngnfrom predators.
The hard scalesnthat cover itsnstrong body servefas excellentnprotection fromnany attack.
NIDOQUEEN’s body is encased innextremely hard scales. It is adept atnsending foes flying with harsh tackles.fThis POKéMON is at its strongest whennit is defending its young.
NIDOQUEEN’s body is encased innextremely hard scales. It is adept atnsending foes flying with harsh tackles.fThis POKéMON is at its strongest whennit is defending its young.
It is adept at sending foes flying withnharsh tackles using its tough, scaly body.nThis POKéMON is at its strongest whennit is defending its young.
The body is covered by stiff, needle-nlike scales. If it becomes excited,nthe needles bristle outwards.
Its hard scales provide strong protection.nIt uses its hefty bulk to executenpowerful moves.
Its entire body is armored withnhard scales. It will protect thenyoung in its burrow with its life.
Its entire body is armored withnhard scales. It will protect thenyoung in its burrow with its life.
Its entire body is armored withnhard scales. It will protect thenyoung in its burrow with its life.
Its body is covered with needle-likenscales. It never shows signsnof shrinking from any attack.
It uses its scaly, rugged body tonseal the entrance of its nest andnprotect its young from predators.
Son corps est recouvert d’écaillesnsolides. Il donnera sa vie pournsecourir les petits de son terrier.
Its entire body is armored withnhard scales. It will protect thenyoung in its burrow with its life.

Its entire body is armored withnhard scales. It will protect thenyoung in its burrow with its life.
ウロコで　おおわれた　がんじょうなnからだで　すあなの　いりぐちをふさぎnてきから　こどもたちを　まもる。
비늘로 뒤덮인 튼튼한n몸으로 둥지의 입구를 막아n상대로부터 새끼들을 지킨다.
Il se sert de son corps lourdement protégé pournempêcher les prédateurs d’accéder à son nid.
Es benutzt seinen schuppigen Körper, um dennHöhleneingang als Schutz für seine Jungen zu sperren.
Usa su cuerpo duro y escamoso para sellar la entradana su madriguera y protegerse de los depredadores.
Con il suo corpo robusto e squamoso sbarranl’accesso alla tana e protegge i piccoli dai predatori.
It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrancenof its nest and protect its young from predators.
ウロコで　覆われた　頑丈な　体でn巣穴の　入り口を　ふさぎn敵から　子供たちを　守る。
かたくて　はりのような　ウロコがnからだを　おおっている。nこうふんすると　はりが　さかだつ。
단단하고 바늘 같은 비늘이n몸을 뒤덮고 있다.n흥분하면 바늘이 곤두선다.
Son corps est recouvert d’écailles en forme denpointes. Quand ce Pokémon s’énerve, ses pointesnse dressent de façon menaçante.
Sein Körper ist mit massiven, nadelartigennSchuppen überzogen. Wenn es erregt ist,nschießen die Nadeln hervor.
Tiene el cuerpo recubierto de escamas duras yncortantes. Cuando se inquieta, las usa parandefenderse.
Il corpo è ricoperto di dure squame appuntite chengli si rizzano quando si inquieta.
The body is covered by stiff, needlelike scales.nIf it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.
硬くて　針のような　ウロコがn体を　覆っている。n興奮すると　針が　逆立つ。
かたい　ウロコで　おおわれた　からだを　ぶつけてnあいてを　はじきとばす　こうげきが　とくいだ。nこどもを　まもる　ときが　いちばん　つよい。
단단한 비늘로 뒤덮인 몸을 부딪쳐서n상대를 튕겨내는 공격이 특기다.n자식을 지킬 때 가장 강하다.
Le corps de Nidoqueen est protégé par des écaillesnextrêmement dures. Il aime envoyer ses ennemis voler en leurnfonçant dessus. Ce Pokémon utilise toute sa puissancenlorsqu’il protège ses petits.

Nidoqueens Körper ist mit sehr harten Schuppen bedeckt.nEs ist sehr geschickt darin, Gegner mit starken Attackennwegzuschleudern. Dieses Pokémon entwickelt am meistennKraft, wenn es seine Jungen verteidigt.

Nidoqueen tiene el cuerpo totalmente recubierto de escamasndurísimas. Suele lanzar por los aires a sus rivales de losnviolentos golpes que les propina. Cuando se trata dendefender a sus crías, alcanza su nivel máximo de fuerza.
Il corpo di Nidoqueen è racchiuso in una corazza durissima.nRiesce a scagliare i nemici lontano con un colpo secco.nQuesto Pokémon dà il massimo di sé quando difendeni propri cuccioli.
Nidoqueen’s body is encased in extremely hard scales.nIt is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles.nThis Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
硬い　ウロコで　覆われた　体を　ぶつけてn相手を　弾き飛ばす　攻撃が　得意だ。n子どもを　守る　ときが　一番　強い。
かたい　ウロコで　おおわれた　からだを　ぶつけてnあいてを　はじきとばす　こうげきが　とくいだ。nこどもを　まもる　ときが　いちばん　つよい。
단단한 비늘로 뒤덮인 몸을 부딪쳐서n상대를 튕겨내는 공격이 특기다.n자식을 지킬 때 가장 강하다.
Le corps de Nidoqueen est protégé par des écaillesnextrêmement dures. Il aime envoyer ses ennemis voler en leurnfonçant dessus. Ce Pokémon utilise toute sa puissancenlorsqu’il protège ses petits.

Nidoqueens Körper ist mit sehr harten Schuppen bedeckt.nEs ist sehr geschickt darin, Gegner mit harten Attackennwegzuschleudern. Dieses Pokémon entwickelt die größte Kraft,nwenn es seine Jungen verteidigt.

Nidoqueen tiene el cuerpo totalmente recubierto de escamasndurísimas. Suele lanzar por los aires a sus rivales de losnviolentos golpes que les propina. Cuando se trata dendefender a sus crías, alcanza su nivel máximo de fuerza.
Il corpo di Nidoqueen è racchiuso in una corazza durissima.nRiesce a scagliare i nemici lontano con un colpo secco.nQuesto Pokémon dà il massimo di sé quando difendeni propri cuccioli.
Nidoqueen’s body is encased in extremely hard scales.nIt is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles. ThisnPokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
硬い　ウロコで　覆われた　体を　ぶつけてn相手を　弾き飛ばす　攻撃が　得意だ。n子どもを　守る　ときが　一番　強い。
かたい　ウロコに　おおわれたnがんじょうな　からだの　もちぬし。nウロコは　はえかわるらしい。
단단한 비늘에 뒤덮인n튼튼한 몸의 소유자.n비늘은 다시 자라는 것 같다.
堅硬的鱗片包裹著牠n強壯的身體。這些鱗片n似乎會不斷生長替換。
Son corps musclé est recouvert de dures écailles.nOn dit qu’elles peuvent repousser.
Nidoqueen besitzt einen robusten Körper,nder von harten Schuppen bedeckt ist. Diesenscheinen immer wieder nachzuwachsen.
Su robusto cuerpo está recubierto de escamasndurísimas que se renuevan constantemente.
Sembra che le dure squame che ricoprononil suo corpo robusto cadano ciclicamentenper poi ricrescere.
Tough scales cover the sturdy body ofnthis Pokémon. It appears that the scalesngrow in cycles.
硬い　ウロコに　覆われたn頑丈な　体の　持ち主。nウロコは　生え変わるらしい。
坚硬的鳞片覆盖着n强壮的身体。据说它的n鳞片会自己长出新的。
